code: import{SET_ACTIVE_TAB,OPEN_USER_PROFILE_SIDEBAR,CLOSE_USER_PROFILE_SIDEBAR,SET_CONVERSATION_NAME_IN_OPEN_CHAT}from"./constants";export var setActiveTab=function setActiveTab(tabId){return{type:SET_ACTIVE_TAB,payload:tabId};};export var openUserSidebar=function openUserSidebar(){return{type:OPEN_USER_PROFILE_SIDEBAR};};export var closeUserSidebar=function closeUserSidebar(){return{type:CLOSE_USER_PROFILE_SIDEBAR};};export var setconversationNameInOpenChat=function setconversationNameInOpenChat(conversationName){return{type:SET_CONVERSATION_NAME_IN_OPEN_CHAT,payload:conversationName};};
